definition: to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The viaducts are arteries for urban traffic in Shanghai so they are of fundamental importance.
sentences.chinese: 上海高架道路是城市交通的大動脈，其地位十分重要。

sentences.english: The paper evaluates the operation status of Shanghai South-North Viaduct from the traffic angle.
sentences.chinese: 本文從交通角度來評價上海南北高架道路的運行狀況。

sentences.english: SunHe Street Overhead Road is the first overhead road with the total length of 5.
sentences.chinese: 順河街高架路是濟南市第一條高架道路，全長5。

sentences.english: Shanghai China Link, viaducts built first.
sentences.chinese: 上海中環線首段高架道路建成。

sentences.english: I also find more overpasses and elevated highways have been built.
sentences.chinese: 我也發現建造了更多人行天橋和高架道路。

sentences.english: The viaduct of the Inner Ring Rd (IRR)abstract: is the core part of Shanghai viaduct network.
sentences.chinese: 內環線高架道路是上海市高架網絡的核心部分。

definition: highway/expressway/same as 高速公路[gao1 su4 gong1 lu4]
mixed use (e.g. pedestrians and vehicles)/joint operation (e.g. trains and buses)
abbr. for 立體交叉|立体交叉[li4 ti3 jiao1 cha1] overpass
to go through/to pass through/to be in general use
